paper_abstract: A novel approach to Episodic Associative Memory (EAM), known as Episodic Associative Memory with a Neighborhood Effect (EAMwNE) is presented in this paper. It overcomes the representation limitations of existing episodic memory models and increases the potential for their use in practical application. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A novel Episodic Associative Memory model for enhanced classification accuracy
